description._content: Image taken from: Title: "An Essay on the spirit and influence of the Reformation by Luther ... Faithfully translated from the last Paris edition by B. Pour servir d'appendice à l'Essai sur l'esprit et l'influence de la réformation de Luther" Author: VILLERS, Charles François Dominique de.
